name: Frozen Frenzy [Beta 1.0]
description:
Frozen Frenzy is a fun puzzle game still in development! This is my first ever game design project and I plan to update this game occasionally. 

Make your way through the icy puzzles to reach the gold chests! Collect emerald and silver chests along the way to increase your score!

* Controls:Menu:
"ARROWS" - change selection
"ENTER" - make selection
Gameplay: 
"WASD" or "ARROWS" - move character
"SPACE" - action button
"R" - reset
"F" - fullscreen
** Known bugs:
- You must move the character before pressing any other buttons to avoid soft-lock.
- White rocks directly 1 tile away from empty holes will not move.
- Some sound effects do not play.
